name: Switcheroo (itch)
description:
"WASD + Left click to switch!"

Kill as many enemies as possible before dying. Here's the catch though... you have no weapon. Instead, you can swap places with enemies and objects by clicking on them. Drop them from heights, make enemies land on each other, blow them up with an explosive enemy, or redirect missiles to fly into them.

We plan to add more enemies and powerups and objects over time to this, but this is what we were able to complete in the timeframe of the game jam.
